snippet: Long a leader in green energy investing, the company has announced new agreements that nearly double its pledge on renewable energy.
abstract: Google announces new agreements to buy renewable energy to power its operations; deals for wind and solar power are nearly double what it had previously promised.
lead_paragraph: Long a leader in green energy investing, the company has announced new agreements that nearly double its pledge on renewable energy.

headline.main: Google’s Latest Steps to Increase Its Use of Renewable Energy
headline.print_headline: Google to Nearly Double the Green Power It Buys
